app_descript:
App Name: Roundee

Brief: Roundee is an innovative video conferencing tool designed specifically for remote teams, offering a range of features that streamline the online meeting process. Boasting an easy-to-use platform that emphasizes "Meetings made meaningful", Roundee provides functionalities that enhance collaboration before, during, and after video calls. With no need for logins or codes, and with the offer of a customizable personal dashboard, this app is a go-to for teams eager to improve meeting productivity and creativity beyond physical boundaries.
